item.title: Claws help
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Instead of using the dragon claws model, I decided to use the claws already on the server… Well I need help…

[code] if(i == 6587){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Weild”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = -22464;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 4550;
class8.anInt174 = 7215;
class8.anInt181 = 919;
class8.anInt190 = 459;
class8.anInt204 = 138;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 3;
class8.anInt165 = 7218;
class8.anInt188 = 7217;
class8.anInt200 = 7219;
class8.anInt164 = 7220;
class8.anInt166 = 63;
class8.anInt173 = 120;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Claws”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A powerful pair of claws.”.getBytes();

}[/code]

Can someone fix that, and make it so all of the colored parts are red? I haven’t messed around with recoloring or anything in the class8 for awhile.
